item.title: Graffiti of St. George flag, 21st September
item.description:
This graffiti of the St. George flag has been placed on this roundabout in an untimely manner and makes immigrants and people of colour feel uncomfortable and unwelcome in this neighbourhood. There have been protests about this in central London where some people have been harassed and assaulted. I would hope that Bromley promotes equality and acceptance of all cultures within England. Please fix by repainting this functional traffic signal for its intended purpose and not to promote any ideals that make people feel like they are not welcome. Thank you

Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by OpenStreetMap): Court Farm Road, Mottingham, London
Report on FixMyStreet

item.title: A Sainsbury delivery driver has dumped a load of packing crates in the lane, 21st September
item.description:
A grocery delivery driver has dumped a whole load of plastic packing cases in the lane …they were strewn across the lane blocking access to cars and residents …I have tidied them up but they need removing please. ALSO, recent builders have left a drain cover in the lane it has been there a couple of months and needs removing too thank you
Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by OpenStreetMap): New Beckenham, London
Report on FixMyStreet

item.title: Tree support been pulled out, tree no longer there, 21st September
item.description:
